entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/2. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E16: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/2. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Tóth, Zsolt
2. Rudas, Tamás
2. Sági, Matild
3. Gazsó, Tibor
4. Sik, Endre
5. Róbert, Péter
6. Csizér, Kata
entry.dcterms:contributor: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees Representative Office in Hungary (4.)
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: 1. abolition of the regular army service, introduction of mercenary army, the new flat support system 2. perception of inflation 3. evaluation of politicians, party preferences, evaluation of the work of the government and opposition 4. admitting refugees, the issue of refugees in the press 5. opinions about NATO membership, the further expansion of NATO 6. safety on the roads, current and planned penalty for traffic offences, the two plans (point system - zero tolerance), the work of traffic police
entry.dcterms:subject: economic conditions and indicators
economic policy
conflict, security and peace
housing
consumption/consumer behavior
transport, travel (and mobility)
migration
mass political behavior, attitudes
social behaviour and attitudes
political institutions, public administration
local society, region
international politics and organisations
person
survey data
cross-section
Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the Leslie Kish key and the random walking method.
face-to-face interview
block 1: A, block 2: C, block 3: A, block 4: A, block 5: A, block 6: A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
